column5: Just got back from family vacation where we fished Packwash lake. We stayed at Trout river lodge and have rebooked again for the same time (3rd week in june). We fished Bruce,East and Packwash lake with Packwash being the most consistent. As we intend to return next spring,does anyone have any tips/locations they would care to pass on to help me locate fish? We did Ok however, I am not above asking for assistance to fish a lake that large when its totally new to me. Anyone aware of any chips for my lowrance or good maps that cover Packwash to better locate structure/avoid navigation hazards? Thanks for any assistance. PM me if you prefer.
